title: Nasus should not be able to snowball back into the game when killed 3 times in lane
body: I don't think it makes any sense for a nasus to be able to solo 1v5 a team and one shot carries when he loses lane. Champions like this just ruin the experience of the game and don't let winning laners be rewarded.

replies.body:
[The match in question for anyone who cares.](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2417496579/207022250?tab=overview)

Kills don't mean much if you don't actually get anything out of them.  

Even with Nasus' early deaths, he out-farmed you and out-leveled you rather severely and his team had a significant lead on objectives throughout the game.

Basically, you didn't leverage his deaths to build an actual advantage in gold, experience or objectives.
---------------
The fact that your team had no percentage-penetration or percentage-health items helped him significantly.  

Any of the following items would have been rather helpful:
{{item:3036}} {{item:3033}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3151}}

Complains about snowballing, because he couldn't capitalize on a lead.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
If you let Nasus walk past your tanks and do as he please, you deserve to get 1v5'd.
Unless you have a team with zero crowd control and none of you have any idea on how to kite, Nasus shouldn't be able to take on more than two people at once unless he's ahead.

Zed, Yasuo, Fiora, Lee, Kha ect should not beable to snowball from one early kill.


Its called late game champs vs Early game Champs.

Nas is late game.  He will get there in every game that gets to late game.
well if you dont punish and push lanes and end the game off those kills and him being behind and the game draws out then yea it happens
Don't let the game go on to 40+ min then

Because he's patient and his team knows how to stall out long enough for him to become useful?


Are you sure you just don't know how to snowball?
This time, on Things That Never Happened!

I don't think its an issue of him being able to get back in the game, I feel its just ridiculous how you can kill him once in lane, but he gets so many free stats that in just a minute or 2 hes able to kill you easily and without much effort. compared to someone like gp, nasus has his laning phase way too easy. Gp is so bad in lane that he has to take exhuast due to the fact that he can lose lane to virtually anyone, and even then people can still kill him pretty easily, while with nasus after you get your first little armor item(shroud) he can free farm all he wants because you can barely touch him and he just regens all the dmg you do to him Gp has his oranges but he still gets dumpstered by the majority of laners.
